about_the_game: Step into the dark and mysterious world of AWAKEN - Astral Blade with this stunning artbook. Featuring concept sketches of characters, terrifying bosses, and hostile environments, this collection showcases the creative process behind the game’s captivating visuals. Explore intricate designs of mutants, ancient ruins, and the eerie beauty of Horace Islands.
